channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Indian movie, loved abroad, is snubbed at home for Oscar submission

item.title: Bill Clinton discharged from hospital after being treated for flu
item.description: Former President Bill Clinton was released from a hospital in Washington. D.C., on Christmas Eve, following an overnight stay for treatment of a fever...

item.title: Ex-Abercrombie & Fitch CEO has dementia, lawyers say

item.title: Man faces murder charges in the death of a woman who was lit on fire in New York City subway
Everything to know about platinum and palladium, the other precious metals
item.description: Platinum and palladium can be valuable alternative investments, but their volatility could make them more risky.

item.title: Trump wants mass deportations. A ride-along with immigration officers shows the challenges

item.title: Relief, defiance, anger: Families and advocates react to Biden’s death row commutations
Russian ship under US sanctions sinks after engine room blast
item.description: Ursa Major ran into trouble in the Mediterranean between Spain and Algeria, with two crew still missing.

item.title: Starbucks baristas' 'strike before Christmas' has reached hundreds of U.S. stores
item.description: Starbucks' union says workers are walking off the job at some 300 — out of over 10,000 — stores across the U.S. as contract negotiations falter. The c...

item.title: Mozambique's opposition leader vows to install himself as president
item.description: Venâncio Mondlane has rejected his electoral defeat, as unrest spreads in the southern African state.

item.title: Starbucks strike to expand to more than 300 stores, union says
item.description: More than 5,000 workers are expected to take part in walkout that ends later on Christmas Eve, according to labor group.

item.title: Is a high-yield savings account still worth it? Here's why it may be, according to experts.
item.description: A high-yield savings account may be worth it for savers — especially those with short-term savings goals.

item.title: American Airlines flights nationwide briefly delayed by "technical issue"
item.description: American Airlines requested a nationwide ground stop, which was later canceled, on the morning of Christmas Eve due to technical problems.

item.title: Denmark boosts Greenland defence after Trump repeats desire for US control
item.description: The huge package is announced after the president-elect said US ownership of Greenland was a "necessity".

item.title: American Airlines resumes flights after technical issue
item.description: Flights were suspended for around an hour due to an issue that impacted the systems needed to release its planes.
